apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a woman with a warm, medium skin tone leaning in for a gentle kiss, her lips slightly parted and a soft blush gracing her cheeks. The signature Apple design language imbues her with a subtle 3D sheen, highlighting the smooth curves of her face and the delicate rendering of her hair, all presented with realistic lighting. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, conveys affection, romantic interest, or a playful farewell, adding a personal touch to digital conversations.
